#include <iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t>0)
    {
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        string *name= new string[n];
        int *sign=new int[n];
        string s;
        char c;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>s;
            cin>>c;
            name[i]=s;
            if(c=='+')
                sign[i]=1;
            else
                sign[i]=-1;
        }
        int score=sign[0],flag=0;
        for(int i=1;i<n;i++)
        {
            flag=0;
            for(int j=i-1;j>=0;j--)
            {
                if(name[i]==name[j])
                {
                    if(sign[j]==1)
                    {
                        score=score+sign[i]-1;
                    }
                    else
                    {
                        score=score+sign[i]+1;
                    }
                    flag=1;
                }
            if(flag==1)
                break;
            }
            if(flag==0)
            score=score+sign[i];

        }
        cout<<score<<"\n";
        t--;
    }
    return 0;
}
